page.title: 17Activities of Adults & Kids
page.content: 35% of parents listed sports as their most important spare time activity, with most popular being badminton, swimming, golf, and football. This trend was also reflected by the older children in our school, as about 45% of 9 to 11 year olds said they played badminton or football or went swimming regularly. Most children or adults play badminton or go swimming at the Westcroft Leisure Centre in Carshalton. All the 9 to 11 year old boys play football at school but many of them and some 8 year olds also play in the local mini league clubs that meet on Saturday mornings.All the 5 to 7 year olds spent alot of their spare time watching television. The older did not spend as much time watching television, and only 5% of parents listed watching TV as a spare time activity. By Brandon Hill SchoolN
